alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:13PM CDT until July 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Haywood, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Savanna... Ashland... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haywood... Scipio... Blanco... Arpelar... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
